title: [Dynamic Regions] Entry cache does not warm up before transferring leader
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

Raftstore v2 does not yet support warming up entry cache before transferring leader.

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->

v7.0.0

### What did you expect?

Warm up cache before transferring leader.

### What did happened?

Does not warm up.
